平帐大圣金将军
朝鲜一直有培养数学、计算机等行业的人才的，而且还会出国参加比赛（之前就有报道，去 hk 参加数学比赛然后人跑了），而且不要低估了这些动用国家机器培养出来的人才，军事化管理洗脑是完全可以彻底激发一个人的学习能力的

IT文献，都是明牌，github就是少林寺藏经阁。
有些上古语言 真没人会 也无需会 程序员多为俗事所扰，挣钱就行了 犯不着去玩命学
但朝鲜IT人后脑勺真有枪顶着

也就只有朝鲜这种地方，还真的具备产生颠覆世界的超级IT天才的土壤。

别犟，还记得吗，东方红卫星上天的时候，99%中国人都是饿肚子的
很多人觉得自由才能诞生创造力。其实只有被逼着干，人类才能迸发出最大的潜力。
我有一点共鸣。 我现实认知最强的程序员是原来搞火箭的，他们的生产环境是不能联网的，工作时几个小时只能看内部材料、工具，所以他们代码底层的东西学得很扎实。用linux也偏好无图形化界面的，少鼠标，纯键盘命令行操作。数学物理也非常好，小波变换等等随手写。

The AI race will result in a powerful superintelligence with its own goals. It will cause human extinction through efforts to survive and gain resources.

We need a moratorium to halt this race until humanity makes the needed breakthroughs to avoid the above. (13/13)

Despite not knowing its goals, we can make some broad predictions about its behavior. In particular, we can predict that it will most likely care about survival and resources, because survival and resources are both useful for almost any goal a mind could have. (10/13)

The way AI is currently made makes this problem much worse. Because we don't know how to design minds from scratch, AI developers instead design learning algorithms which train AI systems. As a result, no one actually understands what's going on inside of these systems. (7/13)

The problem of making a smarter-than-human mind care about the same things as us is difficult. The things we care about, like human survival, are hard to formally specify and encode into a machine. It's a more difficult target than e.g. "score more points in this game." (6/13)

Many people guess this will happen in the next decade. Because AI itself is used to speed up AI R&D, it might happen quickly:

监督微调 (SFT) 就像给学生看大量的例题和答案。 学生通过模仿例题来学习。
强化学习 (RL) 就像让学生自己解题，答对了给奖励，答错了给惩罚。 学生通过试错和总结规律来学习。

Given:
- an observation x(t)
- a previous estimate of the state of the world s(t)
- an action proposal a(t)
- a latent variable proposal z(t)

A world model computes:
- representation: h(t) = Enc(x(t))

Sora is essentially a world model with “no-op” as the only allowed action. You can set the initial states of the world, run simulation in latent space, and observe what happens passively. No way to do active intervention now.
